xwikidoc.name: Documentation
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
1 Documentation
#set($space = "L10NCode")
1.1 Classes #set($sql = "where doc.web='$space' and doc.content like '%@type class%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Sheets #set($sql = "where doc.web='$space' and doc.content like '%@type sheet%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Translations
#set($sql = "where doc.web='$space' and doc.content like '%@type translation%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Content pages with translations
#set($sql = "where doc.web='$space' and doc.content like '%@type content%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Scripts
#set($sql = "where doc.web='$space' and doc.content like '%@type script%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Services
#set($sql = "where doc.web='$space' and doc.content like '%@type ajaxservice%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Templates
#set($sql = "where doc.web='$space' and doc.content like '%@type template%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Mail Templates
#set($sql = "where doc.web='$space' and doc.content like '%@type mailtemplate%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Pages with groovy
#set($sql = "where doc.web='$space' and doc.content like '%@type groovy%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Pages with no type
#set($sql = "where doc.web='$space' and doc.content not like '%@type%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
1.1 Pages with programming rights
#set($sql = "where doc.web='$space' and doc.content like '%@programming%' and doc.content not like '%TODO DELETE%' order by doc.name") #foreach($page in $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql)) * [$page] #end
